name: Delvers
description:
Embark on an epic journey in Delvers, the thrilling strategy game that combines exploration, base building, and the hunt for extraordinary loot! Immerse yourself in a world where RPG and idle game elements meld seamlessly, creating an addictive and unique gaming experience.

Adventure awaits beneath the surface! Dive deep into the unknown as you unearth diverse biomes, exotic plants, and precious minerals. Expand your domain, hire diligent workers, and master the art of automated crafting. Train fearless mercenaries, vanquish terrifying monsters, and collect randomly generated weapons and armor to become unstoppable!

And the best part? Your progress never stops! Delvers features offline progress, ensuring that crafting continues even when you're away or your computer is shut down. The world of Delvers is waiting for you, so gear up and get ready to conquer the depths!

Join us as we shape the game's future together! Currently in its action-packed alpha stage, "Delvers" is rapidly evolving, with bugs and crashes being addressed as we go. Be part of our vibrant Discord community and share your invaluable feedback to help us make the game even better!
